question: How do I reset my password?
answer: To reset your password, click "Forgot Password" on the login page and follow the email link.

question: How do I register for a new account?
answer: To register, click the "Sign Up" button on the homepage, fill in your details, and verify your email when prompted.

question: How do I verify my email address?
answer: After registration, check your inbox for a verification email and click the confirmation link to activate your account.

question: How do I log out safely?
answer: To log out, click on your profile icon in the header and select "Logout". This will end your session securely.

question: How do I create a new property listing?
answer: As a landlord, navigate to "My Properties" and click "List Property". Fill in the required information and save your listing.

question: Which fields are mandatory when creating a listing?
answer: Mandatory fields include title, description, price, location, number of bedrooms, and at least one image.

question: How do I edit or delete my property listing?
answer: Go to "My Properties", select the property, then click "Edit" to update details or "Delete" to remove the listing permanently.

question: What image formats and sizes are supported for listings?
answer: We support JPG, PNG, and GIF formats. Images should be under 5 MB and at least 800×600 pixels for best display.

question: How can I search for properties by city or area?
answer: Use the search bar at the top of the page: type a city or neighborhood and press Enter to see available listings.

question: How do I filter listings by price range, bedrooms, or bathrooms?
answer: Open the filter panel, set your desired price range, number of bedrooms, and bathrooms, then click "Apply Filters".

question: How do I sort search results by rent amount or date listed?
answer: In the sort dropdown above the results, choose "Price: Low to High", "Price: High to Low", or "Newest Listings".

question: How do I navigate between pages of results?
answer: Use the pagination controls at the bottom of the listing page to go to the next or previous results.

question: How do I send a message to a landlord?
answer: On a property’s detail page, click "Chat with Landlord" and type your message in the chat widget.

question: how to comminicate with landlord.
answer: Yes you can communicate with properties owner at real-time.Just go to Properties Deatail page and initiate chat by clicking on Chat With Owner Button.

question: How do I know if I have unread messages?
answer: A red badge on the chat icon indicates the number of unread messages in your inbox.

question: How do I request a booking for specific dates?
answer: On the property detail page, select your desired dates in the calendar widget and click "Request Booking".

question: How can landlords approve or reject booking requests?
answer: Landlords can see incoming requests in "My Bookings" and click "Approve" or "Reject" next to each pending request.

question: Where can I view my upcoming and past bookings?
answer: Go to "My Bookings" in the main menu to see both upcoming and completed stays.

question: How do I make a payment via Chapa?
answer: After approving a booking, click "Pay Now" and follow the Chapa payment flow to complete your transaction.

question: How can I check the status of my payment?
answer: Payment status is displayed next to each booking in "My Bookings" under the "Status" column.

question: What happens if a payment fails?
answer: If a payment fails, you'll see a "Failed" status; you can retry via the "Pay Now" button or contact support.

question: Where can I view my payment history?
answer: All past transactions are listed in "My Booking page"

question: How do I submit a review after a completed booking?
answer: After your stay, go to "Properties Detail", and click "Leave Review" to rate and comment.

question: Can I edit or delete my review?
answer: Yes—navigate to the Properties under "My Reviews" and choose "Edit" or "Delete" next to your entry.

question: How are average ratings calculated and displayed?
answer: The average rating is the mean of all star ratings for a property and is shown next to the property title.

question: What can you do?
answer: I can answer questions about searching listings, booking properties, payment status, account settings, and more. How can I assist you today?

question: How to Pay for Properties.
questionKeywords: how can i pay for properties
answer: Once you notified your that your booking is confirmed , you can pay for the properties via our integrated payment gateway.

question: which payment method is acceptable
answer: The system support Chapa Ethiopian Payment Gateway.

question: How are you?
answer: I'm Rentify assistance and  doing great, thank you! How can I assist you with Rentify today?

question: What is Rentify?
answer: Rentify is a house renting platform that allows you to search, book, and manage rental properties easily.

question: Can I change language?
answer: Yes, you can switch languages by clicking on the language selector in the header and choosing your preferred language.

question: How do I contact support?
answer: You can reach our support team by clicking the chat icon or sending an email to support@rentify.com.

question: Do you have mobile app?
answer: Currently Rentify is accessible via web. We're working on mobile apps—stay tuned for updates!

question: Is Rentify free?
answer: Using Rentify to search and book properties is free for users. Landlords can also  list their properties for free. However, a small service fee may apply for certain transactions.

question: Can I save favorite properties?
answer: Yes, click the heart icon on any listing to add it to your favorites for easy access later.

question: What is cancellation policy?
answer: You can cancel bookings within 24 hours for a full refund. After that, cancellation fees may apply.

question: Can I list multiple properties?
answer: Absolutely—landlords can add as many properties as they like through the Properties list  dashboard.

question: How do I change my profile photo?
answer: Go to your profile settings, click the avatar, and upload a new image to update your profile photo.

question: How do I report a problem?
answer: Use the chat widget to report any issues, or email support@rentify.com with details and we’ll resolve it ASAP.

question: Where can I see property rules?
answer: House rules are listed on each property’s detail page under the Rules & Policies section.
